title: How to Make a New York Egg Cream

steps.headline: Get a tall, chilled, straight-sided, or Coca-Cola eight-ounce glass.
Spoon 1 inch (2.5 cm) of chocolate syrup (ideally U-bet Chocolate Flavor Syrup) into the glass.
Add 1 inch (2.5 cm) of whole milk over the syrup.
Pour in cold seltzer (aka soda water) making a nice foamy head to within 1 inch (2.5 cm) of the top of the glass.
steps.description: Use the spoon when pouring to prevent direct pouring into the syrup and milk.

steps.headline: Stir vigorously with a long spoon to mix the syrup and milk into the seltzer foam.
Enjoy the true experience by sipping it slowly with a long straw.
steps.description: Use the straw to stir in between sips. Allow yourself to make sipping noise with the straw as you clean up the foam around the edge of the glass. Enjoy!

text: Get a tall, chilled, straight-sided, or Coca-Cola eight-ounce glass.  Spoon 1 inch (2.5 cm) of chocolate syrup (ideally U-bet Chocolate Flavor Syrup) into the glass.  Add 1 inch (2.5 cm) of whole milk over the syrup.  Pour in cold seltzer (aka soda water) making a nice foamy head to within 1 inch (2.5 cm) of the top of the glass. Use the spoon when pouring to prevent direct pouring into the syrup and milk. Stir vigorously with a long spoon to mix the syrup and milk into the seltzer foam.  Enjoy the true experience by sipping it slowly with a long straw. Use the straw to stir in between sips. Allow yourself to make sipping noise with the straw as you clean up the foam around the edge of the glass. Enjoy!
